Package net.objectzoo.ebc.executor

This package contains classes that help when there is need to synchronously execute an EBC flow.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FlowFactory
    A factory that can be used to create flow instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FlowExecutor
    The FlowExecuter supports both: Execution of existing flows with one of it's static methods and the execution of flows created per execution using the given FlowFactory.
    ProcessAndResultFlowToFunctionAdapter<ProcessParameter,ResultParameter>
    This adapter adapts an ProcessAndResultFlow to a Function.
    StartAndResultFlowToSupplierAdapter<ResultParameter>
    This adapter adapts an StartAndResultFlow to a Supplier.

Package net.objectzoo.ebc.executor Description

This package contains classes that help when there is need to synchronously execute an EBC flow. Usually you should consider twice when using them since this contradicts the idea behind flow design. But there may be cases when this makes sense e.g. when you are interfacing with a non flow design implementation.
